scripts.dev: concurrently "cd ginkgo_backend && npm run dev" "cd ginkgo_frontend && npm run start"
scripts.dev_docker: concurrently "cd ginkgo_backend && docker-compose down && docker rmi ginkgo_backend_docker && docker build --no-cache -t ginkgo_backend_docker . && docker-compose up" "cd ginkgo_frontend && npm run start"
